abstract.text: A set of Unicode character values for use in search operations.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: represents a set of Unicode-compliant characters. Foundation types use
to group characters together for searching operations, so that they can find any of a particular set of characters during a search.
This type provides “copy-on-write” behavior, and is also bridged to the Objective-C
